description: Convert input audio to phase meter video output.
name: aphasemeter

options.description: Set the output frame rate. Default value is 25.
options.name: rate

options.description: Set the video size for the output. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual. Default value is 800x400.
options.name: size

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue contrast. Default values are 2, 7 and 1. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: rc

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue contrast. Default values are 2, 7 and 1. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: gc

options.description: Specify the red, green, blue contrast. Default values are 2, 7 and 1. Allowed range is [0, 255].
options.name: bc

options.description: Set color which will be used for drawing median phase. If color is none which is default, no median phase value will be drawn.
options.name: mpc

options.description: set mono and out-of-phase detection output
options.name: phasing

options.description: set phase tolerance for mono detection
options.name: tolerance

options.description: set angle threshold for out-of-phase detection
options.name: angle

options.description: set minimum mono or out-of-phase duration in seconds
options.name: duration
